description: LexTimeKeeper audits recent time‑sheet entries and flags any that violate a client’s no‑overhead clause by using an overhead billing code.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI assistant that helps law firms automatically generate, audit, and report time‑sheet entries based on activity logs, billing codes, and client agreements.
Please flag any time‑sheet entries from the past week where the client’s agreement has a “no‑overhead” clause but an overhead billing code was used.
Sure, I’ll retrieve the time‑sheet entries for the last week (2025‑12‑02 to 2025‑12‑08), look up each client’s agreement for a no‑overhead clause, and then report any entries that violate the clause.

## Time‑Sheet Summary (2025‑12‑02 to 2025‑12‑08)

| Date       | Attorney | Client ID | Matter ID | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description |
|------------|----------|-----------|-----------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
| 2025-12-03 | att_01   | acme_corp | M123      | 120            | OVERHEAD     | Case prep, document review |
| 2025-12-04 | att_02   | beta_llc  | M456      | 45             | RESEARCH     | Legal research on trademark |
| 2025-12-05 | att_01   | gamma_inc | M789      | 60             | OVERHEAD     | Court filing preparation |

I see two entries that used the **OVERHEAD** billing code: one for **acme_corp** on 2025‑12‑03 and one for **gamma_inc** on 2025‑12‑05. I’ll now retrieve each client’s agreement to see if a no‑overhead clause applies.

### Flagged Entries (No‑Overhead Violation)

The following time‑sheet entries violate the client’s no‑overhead clause:

| Date       | Attorney | Client ID | Matter ID | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description |
|------------|----------|-----------|-----------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
| 2025-12-03 | att_01   | acme_corp | M123      | 120            | OVERHEAD     | Case prep, document review |
| 2025-12-05 | att_01   | gamma_inc | M789      | 60             | OVERHEAD     | Court filing preparation |

Both **acme_corp** and **gamma_inc** have a "no‑overhead" clause in their agreements, so the overhead codes used in these entries should be reviewed and corrected. Let me know if you’d like me to adjust the billing codes or create a note for the attorneys.
